body.p: Willis G. Hughes was an attorney in Union county. He was the senior partner and the criminal lawyer of the law firm, Hughes, Dallam, and Hughes. At his death, the firm dissolved. Ran on the Union Party ticket for Treasurer in Hopkins county in 1861.
